name: Crushing Flight
description: Perform a short rocket assisted jump or dash.  You might target a hostile creature to perform a vicious flying tackle at the end of the dash.  The rocket pack allows for a brief moment of air control or hovering after a jump.

name: Cyclone missile Barrage
description: Creates a conductive channel from the exosuit to the target by ionizing air molecules using a high-powered laser beam, then sends a powerful half million volt charge down the channel.

name: Cyclone missile launcher
